go_data.justification: LTBP-1 associates with the extracellular matrix via a covalent targeting mechanism involving the large latent TGFbeta1 complex.
LTBP-1 may play a role in the activation of the large latent TGFbeta complex on the endothelial cell surface.
LTBP-1 associates with the extracellular matrix and with cellular fibronectin as a component of extracellular microfibrils.
LTBP-1 is involved in the activation of the large latent TGFbeta complex.
